One non-unique Dúnadan hazard creature may be played (not counting against the hazard limit) against a minion company moving to this site, regardless of other cards played.
(1st) Orcs — 2 strikes with 6 prowess (detainment against overt companies); (2nd) Trolls — 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against overt companies).
Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment. Any non-unique Orc or Troll character may be brought into play at this site.

If Angmar Arises is in play, creatures playable keyed to Angmar are keyable to this site. You receive 2 mp if you have a unique faction in play at this site.

Hidden site. Port. This site may only be revealed if Gates of Morning or Doors of Night is in play, and if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. Any hazard creatures normally keyed to Coastal Sea [c] may be played at this site.
Undead — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; any character wounded must make a second body check modified by +2 immediately following the first body check.

Hidden site. Port. This site may only be revealed if Gates of Morning or Doors of Night is in play, and if the company discards (for no effect) a Stolen Knowledge card it controls. Any hazard creatures normally keyed to Coastal Sea [c] may be played at this site.
add together all strikes and consider it a single attack.
If Tower Raided is in play on this site, any version of Morkai is considered located in Arthedain (not in Angmar).

Any non-unique wolf ally normally playable at a (tapped) site in Eriador, The Northern Waste, or Wilderland may be played at this site.

Contains a hoard. Any non-unique Undead creature may be played at this site.
Traps — 5 strikes with 11 prowess (detainment; cannot be cancelled)*

* prowess against these strikes is equal to the mind of defending character (10 for a Wizard); cards that modify a riddling attempt may be played and are considered modifications to prowess against a strike. An untapped character in the company may take a strike already assigned to another character. If any strike is succesful, the site phase immediately ends.

An untapped character in the company may take a strike already assigned to another character. If any strike is succesful, the site phase immediately ends.

Non-Nazgûl creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment. Any non- unique ally playable at any Under-deeps site may be played at this site.

The Rangers of the North faction is playable at this site. Tap a Dúnadan ranger to make Information playable at this site this turn. Tap a non-ranger Man or Dúnadan at this site to give that character ranger skill for the rest of the game. Place this card (or some other token) with the character when he leaves this site.
Tap a Dúnadan ranger or a sage to make Information playable at this site this turn.

heal a character (from wounded to untapped), make a roll. If the result plus the wounded character's mp is greater than 7, the character heals. Otherwise, discard the character and all cards he controls. Woses of the Eryn Vorn faction is playable at this site.
if the result plus the wounded character's mp is greater than 7, the character heals (from wounded to untapped). Otherwise, he is discarded.
